hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
eval ${SETUPKEYS} cd $JENKINS_HOME
git fetch --all CURRENT_BRANCH=$(git branch|grep '*'|cut -d' ' -f2) LOCAL_SHA=$(git rev-parse ${CURRENT_BRANCH}) ORIGIN_SHA=$(git rev-parse origin/${CURRENT_BRANCH})
if [ "$LOCAL_SHA" == "$ORIGIN_SHA" ]; then echo "no changes detected in origin/${CURRENT_BRANCH}" exit 0 fi
echo "CHANGES DETECTED IN origin/${CURRENT_BRANCH}" echo "Updating to ${ORIGIN_SHA} ..." git pull curl -X POST ${JENKINS_URL}/reload
